text: Deepa is a Hindu/Sanskrit Indian given name. Deepa may also refer to: * Deepa (album), a 1992 album by American band Troop, and its title track * Deepa, Meghalaya, India, site of a proposed station on the Dudhnoi - Mendipathar Rail Line * Diya (lamp), an Indian clay lamp ==See also== * DIPA (disambiguation)
title: Deepa (disambiguation)
